instruction: Create a report comparing the human rights record of France and Germany.
output: This report will compare the human rights record of France and Germany by assessing their overall legal protections, freedom of speech and expression, labor rights, gender equality, racial equality and access to judicial system.  More specifically, the report will review the French Human Rights Council, the French criminal code, the Court of Justice of the European Union, German labor rights laws, Germany's gender equality policy, France's effort to combat racism and both countries' access to the judicial system. It will then evaluate the impact of these policies on the human rights offered in each country.
